attributes.action: National inquiry into all rape gangs and subsequent cover ups
attributes.additional_details: To expose the cover ups and failings of Police, Councils, CPS, Social Work, Politicians etc The victims who suffered these appalling crimes against them need closure
attributes.background: Investigate the atrocities carried out over the last few decades by rape gangs on young white girls

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
